inclusion.criterion: Be willing to participate the study and sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The onset of symptoms and signs are less than 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female aged from 14 to 60 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Suffered from systemic collagen immune diseases or other acute or chronic infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use pain-killer drugs may affect the outcome evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop, slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, hypothyroidism, smoker, alcohol consumption.
